dublin_core.dcvalue: New developments in telecommunications will have a profound effect on the delivery of medical care throughout the world In Northern Ireland three trauma centres provide fracture care for their own and surrounding Emergency Departments All trauma referrals are currently taken by telephone It is our experience that the verbal description of the radiographs of a musculoskeletal limb injury can be inaccurate necessitating us to view the plain films of the patient By utilising a recent advance in telecommunications technology the launch of mobile handsets with multi media messaging MMS service capability it is now possible to digitally capture and instantly send an image of a plain film
The use of multi-media messaging in the referral of musculoskeletal limb injuries to a tertiary trauma unit using: a 1-month evaluation.
